io.textile.textile

Class BaseTextileEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.textile.textile.BaseTextileEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextileEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextileLoggingListener

    public abstract class BaseTextileEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextileEventListener
    A default implementation of TextileEventListener that can be extended to override specific methods
